################### #### INFOCARDS #### ###################
Planet Alexandria
The planet Alexandria was discovered after the final fight, in which the Nomads nearly totally forced out.
It is rich on mineral resources, but the high miningrate causes lots of toxic waste.
Many artifactfounds of an ancient high culture, which lived on this planet long time before, let the black market and smuggling rise up in the past years.
OS Botzler
The Ordership Botzler is the twin ship of the OS Osiris.
The name Botzler was given by a pilot, who fighted against the Nomads in the final fight. According to rumors, Klaus Botzler of the Rheinland Navy died, when he destroyed a shipyard of Rheinland, where Nomad Battleships were build. The explosion destroyed all ships which were under construction.
Planet Memphis
Memphis is an uninhabitable planet in Omicron Lambda.
On planet Memphis, scans were carried out at first, however, every time the results were useless.
Scientists aren't sure, how that could happen, but in many theories it is mentioned, that this is caused by the planet surface and atmosphere.
Neither machines nor humans could work at Memphis because of extreme low temperature (ca. -240°C) and strong magnetic fields. This temperature makes any terraforming process impossible: any organism would freeze immediately. Another preventing factor is the high radiation dose emitted by the Dumiat-Fog.
Planet Cairo
Cairo is the mainplanet in the Omicron Lambda-System. This, from The Order controlled planet, is famous for the producing of high quality luxurygoods.
But because they are produced in a rare rate, the necessity is still high.
For providing the water supply of the mostly wealthy society of Cairo, large waterstocks are necessary.From the obvious debris field, the governement of Cairo mines building material for houses and other things. This method is controversial, but tolerated.
Menes Station
Little is known about Menes, because all data are subject to the highest secrecy.
According to rumors, The Order tries to find out more about the Nomads and their ability for taking over humans.
There are strict safety measures for docking and visitors.
+++ It is strictly forbidden to take cargo like Light Arms and Optical Chips with you into the security zone +++
RMS Queen Mary
The Queen Mary is a cruiser of the enterprise “Orbital Spa and Cruise”. On the basis of new London the Qeen Mary as well as its escort, “New London Eye” started.
On board: Prominent guests, who are excited to walk throught the endless department stores of the planet Cairo and to buy some the famous luxury goods.
Also on board: Dieter Bohlen, originating from Rheinland, who had to transact some business in New London after his last holiday trip to Farwaystation.
The systems around Omicron Lambda are very roughly and particularly in Omicron Gamma and the Omega systems high pirate activity has been registered. Thats the reason for the heavy armament of the Queen Mary and its escort.
+++ News +++
Orbital Spa and Cruise informed us, that the contact to the Queen Mary broke off yesterday afternoon.
The local authorities are informed and patrols of The Order are searching in the area, where the signal of the Queen Mary got lost.
Nevertheless, a reason for being worried does not exist, explained a - however extremly procures sounding - press speaker.
The radiation in the area - known as the
-Fog - complicates navigation strongly, so that an average could be possible. However, the Queen Mary can protect their passengers against the damaging effects of the highly energetic radiation. Orbital Spa and Cruise is confidently that the Queen Mary will be found very soon.
New London Eye
The New London Eye is flown by one of the best pilots of the BAF. It is the escort of the RMS Queen Mary.
Nomad City
The Nomad "City" is a giant antique building, which is protected by a strong energy shield. Not much is known about this, also "Hyper Gate" called, building.
Because of that, The Order built a station near to the "City" for studying it.
The four main-generators were destroyed, so the "City" got nearly no energy. Scientists wondered, how the energy shield could be recharged with the little energy, which were still aviable.
Sinai Shipyard
The Sinai Shipyard is used by The Order for producing many things. They sell external ship equipment like weapons, shields and thrusters, but also ships (big transports).
The shipyard gets nearly all its resources from the debris field near Cairo, so the prices are very low.
But the shipyard doesn't guarantee the compatibility or the functionality of weapons and other equipment, because they are made out of debris.
Sierra Nevada Researchstation
Sierra Nevada Researchstation is a boring place, for both V.I.P.s and normal Freelancer...
But all archeologists from Sirius are interested to come here. Each of them want to find a big discovery on the subject "Nomads".
Here you can study the Nomads and their "City" really near. Mabye too near, because Sierra Nevada stands under continuing attacks of the Nomads. However, no large danger to the station and its inhabitants.
OS Djoser
Little is known, like OS Botzler and OS Osiris, about the OS Djoser. But it is popular belief, that the OS Djoser is was sent to the Omicron Major jumphole. It shall defend the system against the Nomads and other enemies of The Order.
A minefield and multiple weapon platforms were set up to stop the Nomads, should the Djoser be destroyed.
Dumiat-Fog
The Dumiat-For mainly consists of frozen water. It is - however - opaque - the scientists aren't sure about the reason of this. Another mystery is the the highly energetic radiation of this cloud.
Radiation and low temperatures because of the opaque Fog make the the Dumiat-Fog and the Planet inside to an lethal place.
